description: SDN controller placement paper published in Cluster Computing Journal.
Won first place at DAC 2025 for energy-efficient AI healthcare research presentation.
Presented Tiny AI research at DAC 2025 and networked with industry leaders.
Research on reinforcement learning for SDN accepted at Cluster Computing Journal.
Began Ph.D. in Computer Science at University of Texas at San Antonio, focusing on IoT and Edge AI systems.
